channel.title: Hadosh Academy Blog
channel.description: Articles on agent engineering, AI architecture, and the future of building cognitive systems.

item.title: LLMs Are Not the Agents
item.description: Most people point at the model and call it the agent. That is the root misunderstanding. The agent is the filesystem â€” the local files that give an LLM memory, structure, and identity. The LLM is just the engine.
